Articles.Content: I had a rocket sitting on the Launchpad of the KSC 2 just so it could look cool. I also planned to drive a rover all the way over there. I went to launch a Duna mission and it told me to recover a vessel on the launch pad and I was confused as I had nothing on the Launchpad. But I recovered it anyway and it turned out to be THE ROCKET ON THE RUNWAY 2 THOUSAND KILOMTERS AWAY. what. That's really weird and un-necessary. Please fix Squad.
Yeah, I landed my first KSC2 "Plane" there and it said I can't use my pad.
